{"id":436912668,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1609447614,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/436912668/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    \n    private int getNext(int n) {\n        int sum = 0;\n        while (n > 0) {\n            int d = n % 10;\n            sum += d * d;\n            n /= 10;\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n    \n    public boolean isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow = n, fast = getNext(n);\n        while(fast != 1 && fast != slow) {\n            slow = getNext(slow);\n            fast = getNext(getNext(slow));\n        }\n        \n        return fast == 1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
